articles.author: Victoria Craw
articles.title: Sex not part of woman’s ‘marital duties,’ court rules in divorce case - The Washington Post
articles.description: A French woman took her case to the European Court of Human Rights after she was ruled at fault in her divorce because she had stopped having sex with her husband.
articles.content: A French woman has won a ruling from Europes top human rights court, with a panel of seven judges unanimously saying she should not have been blamed in her divorce for not having sex with her husband… [+3057 chars]
